title: The Vision of the Throne of God and the Twenty-Four Elders
description: The Vision of the Throne of God and the Twenty-Four Elders; Unknown; London (probably), England; about 1255 - 1260; Tempera colors, gold leaf, colored washes, pen and ink on parchment; Leaf: 31.9 x 22.5 cm (12 9/16 x 8 7/8 in.); Ms. Ludwig III 1, fol. 3v; J.
